main event: A military aircraft observed a lime green object with a trail of flame descending in a zig-zag course.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 6 seconds., The object had bright color and emitted sparks., It was seen from an altitude of 9000 feet., The object appeared to explode at flameout., The sighting had characteristics consistent with a bolide.
sighted object: a lime green object with a trail of flame
